name: @openveo/portal
description: OpenVeo Portal gives access to medias exposed by OpenVeo server associated to an OpenVeo Publish plugin
author: Veo-Labs <info@veo-labs.com> (http://www.veo-labs.com/)

scripts.build:clean: npm run build:clean:back-office-client && npm run build:clean:front-office-client
scripts.build:clean:back-office-client: npx ovRemove ./build/admin && npx ovRemove ./assets/be/views/index.html && npx ovRemove ./assets/be/js/js && npx ovRemove ./assets/be/js/openveo-portal-admin.templates.js && npx ovRemove ./assets/be/js/openveo-portal-admin.js && npx ovRemove ./assets/be/js/openveo-portal-admin.js.map && npx ovRemove ./assets/be/css/index.css && npx ovRemove ./assets/be/css/index.css.map && npx ovRemove ./assets/be/css/index.scss && npx ovRemove ./assets/be/css/scss
scripts.build:clean:front-office-client: npx ovRemove ./build/front && npx ovRemove ./assets/css/style.css && npx ovRemove ./assets/css/style.css.map && npx ovRemove ./assets/js/openveo-portal-lib.js && npx ovRemove ./assets/js/openveo-portal.js && npx ovRemove ./assets/css/style.scss && npx ovRemove ./assets/css/base && npx ovRemove ./assets/css/mixins && npx ovRemove ./assets/css/modules
scripts.doc: npm run doc:openveo-portal && npm run doc:back-office && npm run doc:front-office && npm run doc:server
scripts.postpublish: npm run doc && npm run doc:deploy
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.test:back-office-client: npm run build:back-office-client && npx karma start ./tests/client/backOfficeKarmaConf.js
scripts.test:client: npm run test:front-office-client && npm run test:back-office-client
scripts.watch:front-office-client: npm run build:front-office-client:development && npx ovWatch -d ./app/client/front -d ./assets/themes -d ./assets/views -c build:front-office-client:development
scripts.watch:back-office-client: npm run build:back-office-client:development && npx ovWatch -d ./app/client/admin -d ./assets/be/js/i18n -c build:back-office-client:development
